brief: Access variables of a qualifier as an object
description: This function allows the active variables for a qualifier to be accessed as the properties of an object.

parameters.description: This is the qualifier whose variables are to be accessed as properties of the returned object.
parameters.name: qualifier

parameters.description: If specified and true, the object returned will be suitable to pass as the additionalUntrustedQualifiedVariables parameter of evaluate*() functions. This is intended for testing purposes and should not be used in production.
parameters.name: forTesting

returns.description: Each property is the name of a variable with the value influenced by the forTesting property.
